'Definition of an anthropometric scalin: 'Custom file with all anthropometric measurements used by the scaling law. This is some times called the AnyMan file.'
'Path with the ScalingLaw used. Can be set to override the BM_SCALING parameter and select a custom scaling law.'
'Path with the ScalingLaw used. Can be set to override the BM_SCALING parameter and select a user defined scaling law.'
'Specifies if the standard parameters and anthropometrics parameters are given as external measurements. This defaults to OFF
column3: which means that all segment length are joint-joint distances. This is set automatically based on the ``BM_SCALING`` parameter
column4: but can be overridden if you implement your own scaling law and need to use external mesaurements.'
